question: Which of these bodies is responsible to access the Television audience measurement system?
option2: Film and Television Institute of India
option3: Broadcast Audience Research Council of India
answer: Broadcast Audience Research Council of India
explanation: Broadcast Audience Research Council of India (BARC India) has evolved a transparent, accurate, and inclusive TV audience measurement system on the foundation of robust and future-ready technology. It is a collaborative Industry Company founded in 2010 by stakeholder bodies that represent Broadcasters, Advertisers, and Advertising and Media Agencies as per guidelines of the Ministry of Information & Broadcasting, Government of India.
